about_the_game:
In the barren land after humanity has devastated the earth and nothing left but a memory of the old world, humans preserved in the atomic shelters.
You’re one of the survivors, too stubborn to die, eager to live, and determined to survive.
In this abandoned by god world, you are your only ally.
Scavenge your way in this deserted world and survive by any chance in the Bunker Survival!



In the post-apocalyptic world, you don’t need allies, you need resources to survive.
Anyway, who needs friends when you have all-in-one high-end technology on your wrist?
Thanks to your device you will know everything that’s going around you. You can check if radiation in the area is low enough to scavenge, it will show you available quests and missions and occasionally the right time.



You have one job - staying alive. Be aware of your surroundings and use what you can to survive. In this world, everything wants you dead. Mutated animals, various critters, other survivors, and even mother earth.



In order to survive, you will need suitable tools like guns to protect yourself.
You will encounter multiples enemies and dangers so a small arsenal can come in handy, even if you are going to take a leak in the woods.
Remember, if you hear a noise coming from the bushes never hesitate and always shoot first, then ask questions.
detailed_description:
WE RECOMMEND YOU TO CHECK THESE GAMES


About the Game






In the barren land after humanity has devastated the earth and nothing left but a memory of the old world, humans preserved in the atomic shelters.
You’re one of the survivors, too stubborn to die, eager to live, and determined to survive.
In this abandoned by god world, you are your only ally.
Scavenge your way in this deserted world and survive by any chance in the Bunker Survival!



In the post-apocalyptic world, you don’t need allies, you need resources to survive.
Anyway, who needs friends when you have all-in-one high-end technology on your wrist?
Thanks to your device you will know everything that’s going around you. You can check if radiation in the area is low enough to scavenge, it will show you available quests and missions and occasionally the right time.



You have one job - staying alive. Be aware of your surroundings and use what you can to survive. In this world, everything wants you dead. Mutated animals, various critters, other survivors, and even mother earth.



In order to survive, you will need suitable tools like guns to protect yourself.
You will encounter multiples enemies and dangers so a small arsenal can come in handy, even if you are going to take a leak in the woods.
Remember, if you hear a noise coming from the bushes never hesitate and always shoot first, then ask questions.
name: Bunker Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: People, forced to hide underground due to negative human activities and climate change. In this shattered world, bunkers are the only safe places to stay for more than a few hours. Will you survive?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish
*languages with full audio support
